decision_conditions: Condition : 4 - The developments to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.  Reason for condition: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 5 - The facing materials to be used for the external surfaces of the building/extension hereby approved shall be those specified in the approved drawings 9607/40, 41, 42 and 43 received 16th June 1997 or planning application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory appearance of the development.

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning General Permitted Development Order 1995 (or any other Order revoking or re-enacting this Order) no windows or other openings shall be formed in the side (north-west) elevation of the building without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: To protect the privacy and amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.
description: ERECTION OF SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION.
